mappings.conditionalRendering:
if (processed['resultingCommodities'][Object.keys(processed['resultingCommodities'])[0]]){
                                                                                
                                                                            return processed['resultingCommodities'][Object.keys(processed['resultingCommodities'])[0]].response.map(c => {
                                                                                    
                                                                            let columns_payload=[
                                                                                        
                                                                            {
                                                                                            
                                                                            icon: processed.service_mappings[c.commodity].icon,
                                                                                            
                                                                            flex: '0.1',
                                                                                            
                                                                            class: 'Icon',
                                                                                            
                                                                            iconStyle: { fontWeight: '600', color: processed.service_mappings[c.commodity].inactives.includes(c.assetstatus)? '#afb4bf' : '' }                                                                                        },                                                                                        {                                                                                            class: 'Service',                                                                                            flex: '0.3',                                                                                            text: translation.get('elastic-services.table.names.'+c.commodity),
                                                                                            headerStyle: { fontWeight: '600', color: processed.service_mappings[c.commodity].inactives.includes(c.assetstatus)? '#afb4bf' : '' },
                                                                                        },
                                                                                        {
                                                                                            class: 'POD',
                                                                                            flex: '0.3',
                                                                                            text: c.podcode || c.pdrcode,
                                                                                            headerStyle: { fontWeight: '600', color: processed.service_mappings[c.commodity].inactives.includes(c.assetstatus)? '#afb4bf' : '' },
                                                                                        },
                                                                                        { class: 'Address', flex: '1', text: c.address },
                                                                                        {
                                                                                            class: 'Status',
                                                                                            icon: processed['status_map'][c.assetstatus].icon || '',
                                                                                            iconStyle: { color: processed['status_map'][c.assetstatus].color || '' },
                                                                                            headerStyle: {
                                                                                                color: (c.assetstatus === 'Active' || c.assetstatus === 'Attivo') && processed['status_map'][c.assetstatus].color,
                                                                                                fontWeight: '600',
                                                                                            },
                                                                                            text: c.assetstatus || '',
                                                                                            gap: '10px',
                                                                                            flex: '0.3',
                                                                                        },
                                                                                    ]
                                                                                    let body = [
                                                                                        {
                                                                                            name: translation.get('elastic-services.table.podcode'),
                                                                                            description: c.podcode || c.pdrcode || translation.get('notavalue'),
                                                                                            width: 4,
                                                                                            maxLength: 9 * 4,
                                                                                        },
                                                                                        { name: translation.get('elastic-services.table.prcode'), description: c.prcode || translation.get('notavalue'), width: 4, maxLength: 9 * 4 },
                                                                                        {
                                                                                            name: translation.get('elastic-services.table.activationDate'),
                                                                                            description: c.activationdate ? DateTime.fromISO(c.activationdate).toFormat(translation.get('date_format')) : translation.get('notavalue'),
                                                                                            width: 4,
                                                                                            maxLength: 9 * 4,
                                                                                        },
                                                                                        {
                                                                                            name: translation.get('elastic-services.table.endDate'),
                                                                                            description: c.enddate ? DateTime.fromISO(c.enddate).toFormat(translation.get('date_format')) : translation.get('notavalue'),
                                                                                            width: 4,
                                                                                            maxLength: 9 * 4,
                                                                                        },
                                                                                        {
                                                                                            name: translation.get('elastic-services.table.contractName'),
                                                                                            description: c.contractname || translation.get('notavalue'),
                                                                                            width: 4,
                                                                                            maxLength: 9 * 4,
                                                                                        },
                                                                                        { name: translation.get('elastic-services.table.agreementDate'), description: translation.get('notavalue'), width: 4, maxLength: 9 * 4 },
                                                                                        { name: translation.get('elastic-services.table.ccq'), description: translation.get('notavalue'), width: 4, maxLength: 9 * 4 },
                                                                                        {
                                                                                            name: translation.get('elastic-services.table.prodName'),
                                                                                            description: c.prodname || translation.get('notavalue'),
                                                                                            width: 4,
                                                                                            maxLength: 9 * 4,
                                                                                        },
                                                                                        { name: translation.get('elastic-services.table.category'), description: translation.get('notavalue'), width: 4, maxLength: 9 * 4 },
                                                                                        {
                                                                                            name: translation.get('elastic-services.table.paymentMethod'),
                                                                                            description: c.mainmoptypelabel|| translation.get('notavalue'),
                                                                                            width: 4,
                                                                                            maxLength: 9 * 4,
                                                                                        },
                                                                                        { name: translation.get('elastic-services.table.nRepricing'), description: translation.get('notavalue'), width: 4, maxLength: 9 * 4 },
                                                                                        { name: translation.get('elastic-services.table.conditionEndDate'), description: translation.get('notavalue'), width: 4, maxLength: 9 * 4 },
                                                                                        { name: translation.get('elastic-services.table.turnoffDate'), description: translation.get('notavalue'), width: 4, maxLength: 9 * 4 },
                                                                                        {
                                                                                            name: translation.get('elastic-services.table.description'),
                                                                                            description: c.descintshort || translation.get('notavalue'),
                                                                                            width: 12,
                                                                                            maxLength: 9 * 12,
                                                                                        },
                                                                                    ]
                                                                                    let customStyle= ".Quick-Link-Footer-Header {font-weight: 600; font-size: 1.2rem;}.Quick-Link-Footer-Body {display:flex;gap: 10px;width: 100%;}.Quick-Link {border: 1px solid #c5c7ca57;border-radius: 5px;margin-left: 0;padding: 0.3rem 0.5rem;text-wrap: nowrap;cursor: pointer;flex: 1;}.Quick-Link:hover {border: 1px solid $color-accent;}.Icon-Background {display: flex;align-items: center;justify-content: center;background-color: #1477a0;height: 30px;width: 30px;padding: 0.3rem;color: white;border-radius: 5px;}.Title {display: flex;align-items: center;}.Arrow {display: flex;align-items: center;color: #b61cc8;}"
                                                                                    let footer={
                                                                                        tag:'b2w-customer-360-quick-link',
                                                                                        args:{
                                                                                            options: {
                                                                                                dataFrame: {
                                                                                                    tabs: [
                                                                                                        { tabId: 'fatture', icon: 'products', translationKey: 'vistaFatture' },
                                                                                                        { tabId: 'letture', icon: 'document', translationKey: 'vistaLetture' },
                                                                                                    ],
                                                                                                    concatenate: false,
                                                                                                },
                                                                                            },
                                                                                            seeAll: false,
                                                                                            title: "Quick Link"
                                                                                        }
                                                                                    }
                                                                                    return {tag: 'b2w-c360-card-holder', widgetAttrs: {columns_payload:columns_payload, body:body, customStyle:customStyle, footer:footer}}
                                                                            })}
                                                                            /*<b2w-c360-card-holder
                                                                                footer={{
                                                                                    tag: 'div',

                                                                                    args: '',
                                                                                }}
                                                                            ></b2w-c360-card-holder>*/
                                                                            /*return responses['Services_Power_Status'].map(status => {
                                                                                return {tag:'b2w-card', widgetAttrs:{ name:status.assetstatus, description:status.count}, class:'col-md-6'}
                                                                            })*/

eventCallbacks.tabClicked:
const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
                                                    switch(event.detail.tab){
                                                        case 'power':
                                                            window.history.pushState({'commodity':'power'}, 'C360', '?commodity=power');

                                                            internalState['filter_api'] = [
                                                                {
                                                                    label: 'Power',
                                                                    id: 'Services_Power_Status',
                                                                    method: 'GET',
                                                                    url: '/asset_distinct',
                                                                    parameters: [
                                                                        { key: 'account_code', value: 'return userId', type:'function' },
                                                                        { key: 'distinct_fields', value: 'assetstatus' },
                                                                        { key: 'decorated_fields', value: 'assetstatus&activationdate&assetprevstatus' },
                                                                        { key: 'query', value: 'commodity=power'}
                                                                    ],
                                                                },
                                                                {
                                                                    label: 'Power',
                                                                    id: 'Services_Power_Payment',
                                                                    method: 'GET',
                                                                    url: '/asset_distinct',
                                                                    parameters: [
                                                                        { key: 'account_code', value: 'return userId', type:'function' },
                                                                        { key: 'distinct_fields', value: 'mainmopid' },
                                                                        { key: 'decorated_fields', value: 'mainmopid&mainmoptype&mainmoptypelabel' },
                                                                        { key: 'query', value: 'commodity=power'}
                                                                    ],
                                                                },
                                                            ]
                                                            internalState['table_api'] = [
                                                                {
                                                                    label: 'Power',
                                                                    id: 'Services_Power_Full',
                                                                    method: 'GET',
                                                                    url: '/asset_distinct',
                                                                    parameters: [
                                                                        { key: 'account_code', value: 'return userId', type:'function' },
                                                                        { key: 'query', value: 'commodity=power'}
                                                                    ],
                                                                },
                                                            ]
                                                            internalState['tab_path'] = 'power'
                                                            internalState['columns_payload'] = [
                                                                { flex: '0.1', class: 'Icon' },

                                                                    class: 'Service',
                                                                    col_text: translation.get('elastic-services.columns.commodity').toUpperCase(),
                                                                    flex: '0.3',

                                                                },
                                                                { class: 'POD', col_text: translation.get('elastic-services.columns.pod').toUpperCase(), flex: '0.3', separator: true },
                                                                { class: 'Address', col_text: translation.get('elastic-services.columns.address').toUpperCase(), flex: '1', separator: true },
                                                                {
                                                                    class: 'Status',
                                                                    col_text: translation.get('elastic-services.columns.status').toUpperCase(),
                                                                    flex: '0.3',
                                                                },
                                                            ]
                                                            internalState['table_refresh'] = !internalState['table_refresh']
                                                            internalState['filter_refresh'] = !internalState['filter_refresh']
                                                            break;
                                                        case 'gas':

                                                            internalState['table_api'] = [

                                                            break;

filter.title: Filtra Forniture
filter.description: Clicca su una tipologia per filtrare le forniture
